description: Try our easy to follow Prawn & Zucchini Balls With Caper Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn & Zucchini Balls With Caper Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 550g raw prawns, peeled, deveined, and finely chopped
2 tbs fresh flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped
1 tbs capers, rinsed, gently squeezed dry, and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the prawns, courgette, garlic, parsley, lemon zest and juice, and eggs. Season with salt and black pepper. Mix well by hand. Cover with cling film, and marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour. Meanwhile, put the soured cream, capers, and dill in a separate bowl, and season with black pepper. Stir through until just combined, cover with cling film, and chill until needed.

Pour the oil into a wide heavy frying pan over a medium-high heat. Spoon a little of the prawn mixture into the palm of your hand, and roll into a small ball about the size of a walnut. Continue until all the mixture has been used; you will end up with about 36 balls.

When the oil is hot, gently drop the balls into the oil using a spoon. Fry for 4-5 minutes, turning gently, or until golden brown all over. Do not overcrowd the pan - cook in batches if necessary. Remove from the pan using a slotted spoon, and drain on kitchen paper.
Serve the prawn and zucchini balls on individual plates, with individual bowls of caper cream.
